body_html: I can confirm that doing what @petecoup suggests does work. I'm able to cross-compile from linux amd64 targetting rpi3 hardware (though, I still lack proper tooling to set the --target_triple= properly, but changing by hand works fine so far).
body_text: I can confirm that doing what @petecoup suggests does work. I'm able to cross-compile from linux amd64 targetting rpi3 hardware (though, I still lack proper tooling to set the --target_triple= properly, but changing by hand works fine so far).
body: I can confirm that doing what @petecoup suggests does work. I'm able to cross-compile from linux amd64 targetting rpi3 hardware (though, I still lack proper tooling to set the `--target_triple=` properly, but changing by hand works fine so far).
